can choose which one is which distance

take a listen to my personal favorite

and there are a couple of other quirks
and features that make it notable to be
in here starting with the gear selector
it isn't an old-school lever or even a
new dial instead it's these buttons at
the top of the center control stack
below the climate vents you have p r n
and d and that's how you move the car
between gears by pressing those buttons
like piano keys they feel good and
they're cool and speaking of buttons the
steering wheel in the aviator has some
rather interesting ones to start the
button for voice control is at your left
like thumb pad so if you want to tell it
to find a navigation destination change
the radio you don't have to go hunting
for a voice control button just tap your
thumb on the steering wheel and it's
right up there by itself so you'll never
mistake it for something else that's
pretty cool but the steering wheel is
more interesting than just that over on
the right spoke of the steering wheel
there's this little joystick and it
offers you four options navigation phone
music or settings but if you go into any
of those options you can see that
joystick has now changed its function
and now you can use it to go back or
press ok if you do that the joystick
changes its function once again
basically its function is dependent on
what screen is showing in the gauge
cluster and it will darken the items
that it can no longer do and illuminate
new items when you go into each new
screen and that is a really cool touch
but the cruise control takes this even a
step further look at the steering wheel
you'll notice there are no cruise
controls on it but they're there they're
just hidden they don't light up until
you press the button on the left to
activate cruise control and once you do
you can see all the cruise control
buttons have now lit up and you can
choose between them but you turn off
cruise control and they go away which
actually makes it pretty good you don't
want to be overwhelmed by all the
buttons on your steering wheel so some
of them you can just turn off and they
won't be right there complicating things
and next up moving on to the center
control stack in this car my very

display for the climate control
temperature instead of using like those

temperature display to show what

buttons that you see in so many other

moving on to the center console area
fairly simple you have these two little

then you have slippery for like ice or

normal and they define that in the gauge
cluster as
effortless and balanced
they just went looking for two words
that perfectly sum up the experience the
next one is conserve and it shows you a

on to sport mode which in the aviator is
called
excite and the words they've used to

responsive and engaging i'm not entirely

pretty standard you can choose between
trip
fuel economy tire pressure or my
favorite
calm screen so if you don't want like

is border crossing

carl say hey uh we're in mexico now in

maybe it works for state boarders too as

letter by letter using a keyboard like
